description:
If you choose not to wear a mask for the scamdemic, there are documents you can bring with you to show businesses or anyone who hassles you.

There is no statutory law, there are only guidelines, recommendations, orders & ordinances that are unlawful & unconstitutional- and the “public health emergency” is over & actually never existed, since we now know that medical facilities were never overrun, & according to the CDC’s “most likely scenario”, the recovery rate is 99.74%- less deadly than seasonal flu & the flu shot itself. 

The two new documents are from the CDC & the San Francisco Department of Public Health & clearly state that a mask doesn’t need to be worn if you have trouble breathing. 

•

From the CDC themselves:

https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prevent-getting-sick/cloth-face-cover-guidance.html

•
Printout “health & safety reasons” at top):

From the San Francisco Department of Public Health which has played a leading role in Northern California, nationally, and worldwide in shaping coronavirus response policy: 

https://sf.gov/information/masks-and-face-coverings-coronavirus-pandemic
